about_the_game:
This DLC grants access to the following additional 27 playable songs:
  • Lezamari demo tsurakunai!!
  • Lotus Love
  • flanticnight
  • Kyouen
  • Fabulous
  • Ilias
  • Marionette Metropolis
  • Tenshi no Udedameshi
  • Akutagawa Ryuunosuke no Kappa
  • Mishaguji Empire
  • Iconoclasm
  • supernatural
  • Charisma Rengoku Tenshin
  • GAME OVER (In Disarray)
  • Hakurei Jinja Chounaikai Ondo
  • Hopeless Discord
  • Shunkan Photography
  • Non-Stop Ringing Heartbeats
  • Getsurei 11.3 no Candle Magic
  • Romantic Fall feat. Ayakura Mei
  • Hoshi wo Mawase Tsuki yori Hayaku
  • Dancing Dollz feat. cold kiss
  • Kanbu de Tomatte Sugu Tokeru ~Kyouki no Udongein
  • HAZARD☢AREA
  • VOLUPTÉ (Game Edit)
  • sparkle light
  • Naki oujo no tame no septette
